com.ami.mse.ucms.utils

Class FacesContextHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ami.mse.ucms.utils.FacesContextHelper

  • public class FacesContextHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for setting a message in the faces context.

    The class contains constant for the 3 levels of messages:
    • WARN
    • INFO
    • ERROR
    Author:
    irusev

    • Method Detail

      • setMessage

        public static void setMessage(javax.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity severity,
              String clientId,
              String message)
        Sets a message in the faces context.
        Parameters:
        severity - INFO, WARN or ERROR, see the constants.
        clientId - the id of the message component.
        message - the message itself.

      • clearAllMessaged

        public static void clearAllMessaged()
        Clears all messages that are set in the context.
